entry.title: A socio-political analysis of open source community
entry.summary:
Description

DjangoCon presents A socio-political analysis of open source community

Presented by Ian Bicking

Covers why are we doing what we're doing and why it matters in terms of Open Source and the movement. Focuses on the Django community, what's being produced and finding meaning in that.

Details

  • Category: DjangoCon 2009
  • Language: English
  • Direct Link: http://05d2db1380b6504cc981-8cbed8cf7e3a131cd8f1c3e383d10041.r93.cf2.rackcdn.com/djangocon-2009/22_a-socio-political-analysis-of-open-source-community.ogv
  • Tags: djangocon, djangocon2009, opensource
